title: Easy Factorials
text:
Finding factorials are easy but they become large quickly that is why Lucky hate factorials. Today he have another task related to factorials.For a given number n how many ways factorial n canÂ expressed as a sum of two or more consecutive positive integers. Can you help lucky?InputFirst line contains single integer T < 5001, next T lines followed by an integer N < 108and M < 109.where M is a prime number.OutputPrint the desired result mod M.ExampleInput:1
3 7Output:1Explanation:: 3! = 1+2+3 only one way.Speed Adicts My best time for all cases is 1.57s. Best of Luck have fun:) .
